title: Hateism - Implicit Sequence (2012)
description:
Hateism



Hateism is a band that comes from Chita, Zabaykalsky Krai, Russia. They were formed in 2009 with Dmitry Periwinkle in Bass, Anton Rumyantsev in Drums, Dmitry Pozniak in Guitars, Evgeny Kurbatov in Guitars and Andrew Vodyankin in Vocals. Andrew had some experience in previous years in bands like Dark Revenge, Aesthetics Of Hage, and Uxoricide.

They recorded their first full length album in 2012, entitled Implicit Sequence, containing 10 songs. The album was released on July 2nd, 2012 with no label, produced by themselves in independent way. The album begins with a very short instrumental introduction to open the way for the first song called Abiogenesis. And on they go with the rest of the tracklist, averaging a 4 minute length per song.

On January 29th, 2013, they released a new single called Ã¢â‚¬Å“Transcendence Of HumankindÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, a new song that appears to be the first one of a future second full length album which currently has no release date/name/cover revealed.
